**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 141 2.0 **Prerequisites** a bloodline based on a specific type of creature --- You permanently mutate to become more like the creatures of your bloodline. You gain the appropriate trait or traits for those types of creatures ([aberration](/Traits.aspx?ID=1) for [aberrant](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=1), [angel](/Traits.aspx?ID=8) and [celestial](/Traits.aspx?ID=23) for [angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2), [psychopomp](/Traits.aspx?ID=232) and [monitor](/Traits.aspx?ID=111) for [psychopomp](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=13), and so on). You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) or [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415), if one is appropriate for creatures with those traits. Choose one of the following.
  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline have the ability to fly, you gain a fly Speed equal to your land Speed.
  • If the creatures associated with your bloodline are [aquatic](/Traits.aspx?ID=168) or [amphibious](/Traits.aspx?ID=207), you become amphibious, able to breathe water and air equally well, and you gain a swim Speed equal to your Speed.
  • If creatures associated with your bloodline have a resistance or immunity to acid, cold, electricity, fire, negative, or sonic, choose an energy type your bloodline is immune or resistant to and gain resistance 20 against that energy type.
name: Bloodline Mutation
prerequisite: a bloodline based on a specific type of creature
